definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Qi4 hou4 Bian4 hua4 Kuang4 jia4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 联合国气候变化框架公约

sentences.english: There is no solution to the question of climate change without forestry.
sentences.chinese: 如果不关注森林，那么气候变化问题就是无法解决的。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均气温纪录对认识气候变化的过程至关重要。

sentences.english: A changing climate is adding pressure to the already-stressed agricultural sector.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化正在增加农业部门已经承受的压力。

sentences.english: Droughts and forest fires are expected to increase due to climate change.
sentences.chinese: 由于气候变化，预计将会出现更多的干旱和林火。

sentences.english: Climate change and extreme weather events will further complicate the picture.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化和极端天气现象更使情况雪上加霜。

sentences.english: These negotiations matter hugely for the peak-oil debate.
sentences.chinese: 关于气候变化的协商对石油峰值讨论至关重要。

sentences.english: Climate change and the depleted ozone layer are among the starkest examples.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化和臭氧层耗减就是其中最明显的例子。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heaily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中纬度地区大力提倡植树造林以减缓气候变化。

sentences.english: The portents are bad for next month's climate change summit in Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 这对于下月在哥本哈根召开的气候变化峰会是种恶兆。

sentences.english: President Obama and Prime Minister Rudd also discussed climate change, with Mr.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统与陆克文总理还讨论了气候变化问题。

sentences.english: This article has a brief review on Holocene climate changes in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 简要地回顾了蒙古全新世气候变化研究。

sentences.english: Adaptation alone will not be able to accommodate unabated climate change.
sentences.chinese: 适应气候变化本身不能缓解强劲的气候变化。

sentences.english: Adaptation alone will not be able to accommodate unabated climate change.
sentences.chinese: 适应气候变化本身不能缓解强劲的气候变化。

sentences.english: Climate change is a multi-level governance problem.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化问题是一个多级政府管理的问题。

sentences.english: The water resources are sensitive to the climate change in the Miriverdrainage basin.
sentences.chinese: 弥河流域水资源对气候变化比较敏感。

sentences.english: Ban Ki-moon speaks at the Bali climate change conference in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文在2007年的巴厘岛气候变化会议上发言。

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3

definition: global warming (Taiwan and Hong Kong usage)/written 全球變暖|全球变暖 in PRC
El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean
